thread.title: Instagram launches one-second video app Boomerang to take on Vine
thread.title_full: Instagram launches one-second video app Boomerang to take on Vine

title: Instagram launches one-second video app Boomerang to take on Vine
text:
Instagram launches one-second video app Boomerang to take on Vine 
Breaking News.ie Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Image-sharing giant Instagram has made a play for the short video market by launching a new independent app Boomerang. 
Despite Instagram already supporting the option to capture and share videos of up to 15 seconds, the Facebook-owned service has now stepped up and created a standalone app for even shorter clips â€“ just a single second in this case. 
...
